title: torch.max return wrong result on selected tensor
body_html:
torch.max return wrong result on selected tensor.

In [3]: x = torch.rand(10,10)

In [4]: y = x[:, 2]                ## this is a selected tensor

In [5]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[5]:
(
  0.6744
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  0                                        ## this is wrong 
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [6]: y = x[:, 2].clone()     ## same data with previous y

In [7]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[7]:
(
  0.6744
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  3
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [8]: y
Out[8]:

 0.1533
 0.4855
 0.1404
 0.6744
 0.0296
 0.2307
 0.5875
 0.1057
 0.1528
 0.2445
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]

body:
torch.max return wrong result on selected tensor.

```
In [3]: x = torch.rand(10,10)

In [4]: y = x[:, 2]                ## this is a selected tensor

In [5]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[5]:
(
  0.6744
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  0                                        ## this is wrong 
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [6]: y = x[:, 2].clone()     ## same data with previous y

In [7]: torch.max(y, 0)
Out[7]:
(
  0.6744
 [torch.FloatTensor of size 1],
  3
 [torch.LongTensor of size 1])

In [8]: y
Out[8]:

 0.1533
 0.4855
 0.1404
 0.6744
 0.0296
 0.2307
 0.5875
 0.1057
 0.1528
 0.2445
[torch.FloatTensor of size 10]
```
